info.title: Books Service
info.description: HTTP service for working with books

post.description:
Mark book as picked up

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `books:pickup`

Mark book as reserved. Once a book is reserved timer starts with timeout for the book to become picked up. Timeout is configurable. 
		Once timeout is expired book becomes available

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `books:reserve`

Mark book as returned

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `books:return`

Subscribe the caller on the next 'book's become available

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `books:subscribe`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth security using Basic scheme (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7617)

user_id.description: id of the user picking up the book
user_id.example: Est sit et perferendis hic eos aperiam.

example.user_id: Consequatur voluptatem illo tempora quo voluptas occaecati.

user_id.description: id of the user returning the book
user_id.example: Totam culpa dolore culpa in qui.

basic_header_Authorization.description: Basic authentication used to authenticate security principal during signin

jwt_header_Authorization.description:
Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token retrieved via the signin endpoint. 
	Supports scopes "books:reserve", "books:pickup", "books:return", "books:subscribe"

**Security Scopes**:
  * `books:reserve`: reserve access
  * `books:pickup`: pickup access
  * `books:return`: return access
  * `books:subscribe`: subscribe access
jwt_header_Authorization.name: Authorization
